An area-specific massage is a form of relaxation or sports massage whereby the therapist focuses specifically on certain parts of the body. Area-specific massages are performed in consultation with the client to treat those specific muscles in the body that are suffering from tension. Clients can choose one or two area-specific massages of the following body areas.

ul.li: Lower back, (back of the) legs and calves
Stomach and top part of chest or décolletage

story.p: The most elaborate form of massage consists of all above-mentioned parts of a massage.
